page_2.text: One sunny day, Zoe found a shimmering book in her backyard. As she opened it, a swirl of colorful lights lifted her into the sky!
page_2.scene: Zoe, wide-eyed, stands in a field of flowers, holding the glowing book, as vibrant lights swirl around her, lifting her off the ground.

character.name: Zoe
character.description: Zoe is a lively 6-year-old girl with big, bright eyes and curly hair. She wears a sparkly space helmet and a rainbow tutu, reflecting her imaginative spirit.
